text: Audrius Šlekys (2 April 1975 - 27 July 2003) was a Lithuanian football player. ==Club career== Šlekys played for several clubs in his hometown Kaunas and had spells in Russia with Alania Vladikavkaz and Metallurg Lipetsk. In 2002 he topped the Lithuanian goalscoring charts with 19 goals FOR FBK Kaunas.Lithuania - List of Topscorers - RSSSF ==International career== He made his debut for Lithuania in a July 1996 friendly match against Belarus, his only international game.Intl career stats - EUFootball ==Death== Šlekys was killed in a car accident in July 2003, after he lost control of his BMW near the village of Žiegždriai. title: Audrius Šlekys
